Question: In 1999, The Sporting News ranked this person fifth on their "100 Greatest Baseball Players" list.
Hints: This person dedicated the new exhibit "This person-Chasing the Dream" at the Baseball Hall of Fame on April 25, 2009.
This person was the first player to hit 500 home runs and reach 3,000 hits.
Froemming ignored the rule, allowing this person to be the DH for the Braves.
